Soles4Souls is the largest provider of free shoes to children in need around the world. Soles4Souls collects new and used shoes and clothing to give to those in crisis (in the US and around the world) and to support micro-business efforts to break the cycle of poverty.

Identification Plates, Inc., an almost 50 year old family business, has long been known for providing sheet metal, stock and custom blanks to the awards and recognition industry. We stock over 130 different types of sheet metal. In addition to the standard brass, aluminum and plated steel, we also offer hard-to-find nickel silver, copper, anodized aluminum and stainless steel. From this variety of metals we can fabricate hundreds of different shapes and sizes of blanks for your engraving, sublimation, and laser engraving needs.

We start with a simple premise: engage your audience around THEIR interests, both personal and professional. Our proven model starts with the development of a detailed “member profile” that highlights specific interests, which we in turn use to create products and services that your market wants and values.  RTM Networks subscription-based model provides these services, and the wealth of valuable data it generates, at virtually no cost to you.

Dear Buddy, I've written this recommendation for you to share with other LinkedIn users. Buddy Teaster joined YPO as Chief Networks Officer about one year after I had joined the organization's Senior Management Team. He built the Networks Team from the bottom up, worked amazingly well with member volunteers as well as his peers and 3 - 4 years later had between 60 - 70 fully functioning personal and business networks in YPO-WPO - a feat that was recognized publicly by the Board of Directors. I would not hesitate to recommend Buddy for leadership roles and would be proud to work with him again.

In my capacity as Director of Business Development at Exclusive Resorts, I managed the operations and expansion of our strategic partnership with the Young Presidents’ Organization.  During this time, I had the opportunity to work directly with Buddy as this partnership grew to represent a significant source of revenue for our firm.  In my observation, Buddy is the consummate professional with the ability to quickly identify solutions to critical business and communication problems while successfully navigating the complex personal and cultural makeup of today’s organizations.  In addition to these skills, Buddy has an approachable working style that makes him a great asset to any organization.  I whole-heartedly recommend Buddy and hope that I will have the opportunity to work with him again in the very near future.

April 14, 2009, Rob worked with Buddy but at different companies

To anyone considering Buddy Teaster for a Senior Executive Position:I highly recommend Buddy Teaster for a CEO, CNO, CMO, or other equivalent position.If I had a position open in one of my organizations, I would offer it to Buddy, exclusively.I have worked with Buddy for many years inside of YPO’s decentralized and highly political environment and would suggest that he is nothing less than a master of leadership.  Buddy has worked with CEOs, as the demanding constituents they are, in structured and unstructured circumstances for more than a decade.Starting with his personal traits – were fundamental leadership is rooted – Buddy is centered; intelligent; generous in his acceptance of diverse points of view; and yet he is a subtle focused driver who gets the job done through having others buy-in to supporting his vision.Buddy works effectively in complete environments with for instance CEOs on a global basis and understands how to draw out unspoken needs and expectations. He is current on technologies and programs that help connect people around their interests and passions.  Buddy is humble and will tell you that he runs once in awhile – and you will then learn he ran a 100 mile race the previous weekend.  He will tell you that the team did a great job – and then you will learn he did it himself over the weekend as no one quite understood was what required.Working with Buddy is a pleasure given his great sense of humor, and his propensity to enjoy life – even when things are difficult, Buddy keeps the team going with an objective comment that keeps everyone smiling and the team moving forward.  Above all, Buddy has a deep sense of integrity that comes through in his work and strength of character that inspires all that work with him.Whatever position Buddy ends up deciding to accept, my hope is to continue to work closely with him and to continue to create value together.Feel free to call me on any questions in regards to Buddy Teaster.Sincerely,Rob FollowsFounding Partner, STS Capital PartnersChair, YPO Social Enterprise NetworksWorldwide Cell:  (314) 330-5899

May 23, 2016, David worked with Buddy in the same group

I feel like so many of these recommendations are so generic as to be unhelpful. Let me say that of the many things David Gossett is, generic would NEVER be on the list. Hands down one of the smartest cats I have ever met. His way of seeing the world, sucking in huge amounts of data from all kinds of sources, and this incredible capacity to process and make sense of it is just amazing. I hope all the time for a way that he and I could work together again. It's not easy as he pushes, pushes, pushes to find a better solution to whatever he tackles. I'm a huge fan and cannot encourage anyone with real problems to solve to seek him out.

summary: Combining entrepreneurship, general management, executive education, association and technology experience, Buddy is now CEO at Soles4Souls, a not for profit global social enterprise committed to fighting poverty through the collection and distribution of shoes and clothing.From 2009-2012, he was President/COO of EBS Executive Business Services, a holding company that includes RTM Networks, StarKart and the NALA.• StarKart and NALA provide online and offline advertising to local businesses in the US and Canada.• RTM provides professional and personal development networks for university alumni and membership organizations.Prior to co-founding RTM, Buddy was the Young Presidents’ Organization Chief Network Officer. In that role from 2002-09, he focused on finding new and innovative ways to connect more than 20,000 business leaders from around the world to address business and personal issues. YPO is an education organization with more than 20,000 member CEOs in 100+ countries. Before returning to YPO for the third time, Mr. Teaster was President of ClickPatrol, an online advertising management company, which he and his partners sold in 2002. Previously, he was with Knowledge Builder, where he was co-founder and President/CEO. Before launching his entrepreneurial career in 1998, he spent the last three years of a seven-year stint at YPO as Executive Director and COO.Buddy graduated Phi Beta Kappa with a BA in Religious Studies and French from Randolph-Macon College in Ashland, Virginia USA. He then earned a MA/MBA from Southern Methodist University in Dallas, Texas USA.Buddy is a dedicated ultra runner focusing on 50k, 50 mile and 100 mile trail runs.Specialties: Not for profit, new media, online training, keyword advertising, small business advertising, social networks
name: Buddy Teaster
title: CEO at Soles4Souls, Inc.
